data.eml:eml: A new Pardosa species from northern Iran (Araneae, Lycosidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shafaie, Sepideh, Mirshamsi, Omid, Aliabadian, Mansour, Moradmand, Majid, Marusik, Yuri M. (2018): A new Pardosa species from northern Iran (Araneae, Lycosidae). Zootaxa 4387 (2): 350-364, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4387.2.6
